mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.username as username ,a.password as password ,a.xinlilaoshi_name as xinlilaoshiName ,a.xinlilaoshi_phone as xinlilaoshiPhone ,a.xinlilaoshi_photo as xinlilaoshiPhoto ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.xinlilaoshi_email as xinlilaoshiEmail ,a.xinlilaoshi_shanchang as xinlilaoshiShanchang ,a.xinlilaoshi_lvli as xinlilaoshiLvli ,a.xinlilaoshi_content as xinlilaoshiContent ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM xinlilaoshi a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username},'%')
and a.password like CONCAT('%',#{params.password},'%')
and a.xinlilaoshi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.xinlilaoshiName},'%')
and a.xinlilaoshi_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.xinlilaoshiPhone},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and a.xinlilaoshi_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.xinlilaoshiEmail},'%')
and a.xinlilaoshi_shanchang like CONCAT('%',#{params.xinlilaoshiShanchang},'%')
and a.xinlilaoshi_lvli like CONCAT('%',#{params.xinlilaoshiLvli},'%')
and a.xinlilaoshi_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.xinlilaoshiContent},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
